UH on React

### Screwdriver
http://screwdriver.corp.yahoo.com/projects/35554

## Install

```bash
ynpm install tdv2-applet-uh
```

## Development
```bash
// clone the repository
$ git clone git@git.corp.yahoo.com:givemethebeef/tdv2-applet-uh && cd tdv2-applet-uh

// install the dependencies
$ ynpm install

// start the server
$ ynpm run-script dev

```
